Extending User Disk Space

To extend a user's disk space:

  1. Login to the server
  2. Run this command (what are they?)
  3. lvextend -L+100M /dev/storage/madcrnp (where the last part is the domain username and the number is the amount please use amounts of 100M)

NEW:

  1. resize2fs /dev/storage/madcrnp (where last part is the domain username)

OLD:

  1. resize_reiserfs /dev/storage/madcrnp (where the last part is the domain username)
